definitions.title: 1. n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (cf. Palm. n.pr.m. [[גריבא]] Vog:141) one of David's heroes 2Sa 23:38 = 1Ch 11:40.

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (cf. Sab. n.pr.loc. [[גרבם]] Hal:No. 379, 382) only in [[גִּבְעַת גׇּרֵב]] Je 31:39 hill of Gareb, appar. close to Jerusalem on the SW. cf. Gf; v. also Hi Che.
